alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Conway; Garland; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Northwest Yell County; Perry; Pope County Higher Elevations; Southern Pope County; Van Buren County Higher Elevations; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 2:08PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Perry, west central Van Buren, western Conway, northwestern Garland, central Yell, northeastern Montgomery and central Pope Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 207 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Broomfield to 9 miles northeast of Mauldin. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Danville... Dardanelle... Atkins... Pottsville... Dover... Ola... London... Hector... Lake Dardanelle State Park... Jerusalem... Petit Jean River WMA... Mosley... Taral... Carden Bottoms... Broomfield... Mt Nebo State Park... Plainview in Yell County... Lake Dardanelle... Galla Creek WMA... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 77 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
